summary: The Fifteenth International Conference on Advanced Communications and Computation (INFOCOMP 2025) will be held in Valencia, Spain, from April 06, 2025 to April 10, 2025. It's dedicated to advanced communications and computing aspects, covering academic and industrial achievements and visions.
callForPapers:
# INFOCOMP 2025: Call for Papers

The Fifteenth International Conference on Advanced Communications and Computation (INFOCOMP 2025) will be held in **Valencia, Spain, from April 06, 2025 to April 10, 2025**.

INFOCOMP 2025 continues a series of events dedicated to advanced communications and computing aspects, covering academic and industrial achievements and visions.

## Onsite and Online Options

In order to accommodate various situations, the conference offers the option for either physical presence or virtual participation (pdf slides or pre-recorded videos).

## Scope

The conference solicits academic, research, and industrial contributions. We welcome technical papers presenting research and practical results, position papers addressing the pros and cons of specific proposals, such as those being discussed in the standard fora or in industry consortia, survey papers addressing the key problems and solutions on any of the above topics short papers on work in progress, and panel proposals.

Industrial presentations are not subject to the format and content constraints of regular submissions. We expect short and long presentations that express industrial position and status.

Tutorials on specific related topics and panels on challenging areas are encouraged.

## Conference Tracks

*   Trends and advances on architecture/methods
*   Trends and advances on disciplines/applications
*   Large scale and fast computation
*   Programming models
*   Networks/systems communications
*   Networks/systems measurement, control and management
*   Turbulence modeling and simulation
*   Advanced applications
    *   Computation
    *   Systems
*   Legal context, economic use and re-use
*   Evaluation context
*   Biometry, security, access technologies, algorithms, and applications

## Submission Details

*   Only .pdf or .doc files will be accepted for paper submission.
*   Final author manuscripts will be 8.5" x 11", not exceeding 6 pages; max 4 extra pages allowed at additional cost.

## Important Dates

*   **Submission:** January 20, 2025
*   **Notification:** February 16, 2025
*   **Registration:** February 28, 2025
*   **Camera ready:** March 05, 2025
